name: March 7th
descHash: A girl who once slumbered in eternal ice and knows nothing about her past. To find out the truth about her origins, she decided to travel with the Astral Express. As of right now, she has prepared about <nobr>67</nobr> different versions of her life story for herself.

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

67219.name: Horn of Snow
67219.desc: Broken horn of a Frigid Prowler. Can be used for the Ascension of Ice characters.
67219.lore:
The Silvermane Guards would host contests where the winner must take a body part from a monster and bring it back within a set time limit. This cold broken horn must have been a trophy of one such contest.

"Sir Bova, this is no moose horn and is certainly not fit for decoration above the Geomarrow furnace."

125435.name: Tracks of Destiny
125435.lore: Your victory is secured by countless failures, and the small steps you have taken led you to the turning point of fate.

409960.name: Traveler's Guide
409960.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>20,000</nobr> Character EXP.
409960.lore:
Required reading for world exploration. Press the "Read" button to tune in to an attractive voice in a language you understand, telling you about the legendary encounters of renowned adventurers across different worlds as well as the precious wisdom and knowledge that they have gathered.

"All-new series of the Traveler's Guide, The Chef's Manual to Galactic Cuisine, is now available for purchase."
"For submissions, please connect to synesthesia beacon ERD-23θ to contact an Intelligentsia Guild representative. Method of payment can be arranged to your convenience."

409961.name: Adventure Log
409961.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>5000</nobr> Character EXP.
409961.lore:
A neatly organized collection of educational adventure notes containing countless illustrations and texts entailing adventures from beginning to end, as well as valuable information and survival-related techniques.

"Why not just digitize it and save it on a photolith disk? That'd be much more convenient."
"Advanced technology is far more fragile than you'd think when faced with stellar storms and neuron flow eruptions. Besides, I'm sure the author of this book wanted people to read it in the simplest of ways."

409962.name: Travel Encounters
409962.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>1000</nobr> Character EXP.
409962.lore:
A travel diary with messy handwriting and random content. It's not of much use to you.

"Dan Heng, hurry up and finish reading it so you can throw it away."

549437.name: Thief's Instinct
549437.desc: A small amount of anti-matter. Crude material used for enhancement.
549437.lore:
A small amount of anti-matter that emanates out of the Voidranger: Reaver like the materialization of its destructive instinct.

"They are all looking forward to the moment of obliteration, when they will be reforged and fused with the entire world."
comeFrom: Storage Zone: Voidranger: Reavers or other enemies
Supply Zone: Voidranger: Reavers or other enemies

633378.name: Usurper's Scheme
633378.desc: A moderate amount of anti-matter. Normal material used for enhancement.
633378.lore:
A moderate amount of anti-matter that floats around the Voidranger: Distorter. The amount of matter and anti-matter particles has reached a dangerous balance...

"They are all looking forward to the moment of obliteration, when they will be reforged and fused with the entire world."
comeFrom: Storage Zone: Equilibrium Level 2+ Voidranger: Reavers or other enemies
Supply Zone: Equilibrium Level 2+ Voidranger: Reavers or other enemies

635668.name: Endurance of Bronze
635668.desc: A crude but durable ancient hand-held bronze shield. Used to level up Traces slightly for Preservation characters.
635668.lore:
Ancient legends entail a war where humans exhausted all primitive methods, following the gods into battle against overwhelmingly powerful beasts.
This shield is a witness to that war.

"There's no choice but to stop it, even if the efforts are futile."

717319.name: Conqueror's Will
717319.desc: Condensed anti-matter. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717319.lore:
Highly condensed anti-matter within the body of the Voidranger: Trampler. The moment of obliteration is the trumpet call for civilizations' destruction.

"They are all looking forward to the moment of obliteration, when they will be reforged and fused with the entire world."
comeFrom: Storage Zone: Equilibrium Level 4+ Voidranger: Reavers or other enemies
Supply Zone: Equilibrium Level 4+ Voidranger: Reavers or other enemies

836254.name: Safeguard of Amber
836254.desc: An unusual shield embedded with ambers mined from beyond the skies. Used to level up Traces significantly for Preservation characters.
836254.lore:
The wielder of this shield is seemingly protected by an invisible shield wall, immune to fiery arrows or mountainous claws.
Ancient legends entail a war where a tribal hero wielding a bronze shield charged to their death against a Leviathan, together with warriors armed with fiery spears.
This shield is a witness to that war.

"Do not cross the line."

920195.name: Oath of Steel
920195.desc: A shield forged with irreplaceable craftsmanship from an unknown alloy. Used to level up Traces moderately for Preservation characters.
920195.lore:
It may be a large shield, but it feels as light as a feather. Even after taking on a full charge, no marks can be seen on the face of the shield.
Ancient legends tell of a war where high-spirited warriors wielded deathray-beaming spears and shields forged of Frost Steel, defended a nation destined to falter in the face of war.
This shield is a witness to that war.

"Powerful voices chant: 'The enemies are at our gates!'"

985668.name: Destroyer's Final Road
985668.lore:
The Leviathan's heart has stopped beating, but its mind lives on despite being trapped in a case. As long as the lid is closed, its mind is simultaneously both alive and dead, driving the engine of destruction.

"Doomsday Beast, a blight made in the Warforge using what's left of a Leviathan and the weeping bones of thousands of the dead. It longs for the destruction of the universe and itself."

ranks.name: Memory of You
ranks.descHash: Every time March 7th's Ultimate Freezes a target, she regenerates <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> Energy.

ranks.name: Memory of It
ranks.descHash: Upon entering battle, grants a Shield equal to <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> of March 7th's DEF plus <nobr>#3[i]</nobr> to the ally with the lowest HP percentage, lasting for <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> turn(s).

ranks.name: Memory of Everything
ranks.descHash:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

ranks.name: Never Forfeit Again
ranks.descHash: The Talent's Counter effect can be triggered 1 more time in each turn. The DMG dealt by Counter increases by an amount that is equal to <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> of March 7th's DEF.

ranks.name: Never Forget Again
ranks.descHash:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

ranks.name: Just Like This, Always...
ranks.descHash: Allies under the protection of the Shield granted by the Skill restores HP equal to <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> of their Max HP plus <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> at the beginning of each turn.

skills.name: Frigid Cold Arrow
skills.descHash: Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of March 7th's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: The Power of Cuteness
skills.descHash:
Provides a single ally with a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to #1[i]% of March 7th's DEF plus #4[i] for #2[i] turn(s).
If the ally's current HP percentage is #3[i]% or higher, greatly increases the chance of enemies attacking that ally.

skills.name: Glacial Cascade
skills.descHash:
Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of March 7th's ATK to all enemies. Hit enemies have a #2[i]% base chance to be Frozen for #3[i] turn(s).
While Frozen, enemies cannot take action and will receive Additional Ice DMG equal to #4[i]% of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

skills.name: Girl Power
skills.descHash: After a Shielded ally is attacked by an enemy, March 7th immediately Counters, dealing Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of her ATK. This effect can be triggered #2[i] time(s) each turn.

skills.name: Attack
skills.descHash: Attack an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduce their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

skills.name: Freezing Beauty
skills.descHash:
Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, there is a #1[i]% base chance to Freeze a random enemy for #2[i] turn(s).
While Frozen, the enemy cannot take action and will take Additional Ice DMG equal to #3[i]% of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

embedBonusSkill.name: Ice Spell
embedBonusSkill.descHash: Increases Ultimate's base chance to Freeze enemies by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>.

embedBonusSkill.name: Purify
embedBonusSkill.descHash: Skill removes 1 debuff from an ally.

embedBonusSkill.name: Reinforce
embedBonusSkill.descHash: The duration of the Shield generated from Skill is extended for <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> turn(s).

voiceItems.title: First Meeting
voiceItems.text: Ahem! Hello, Trailblazer. Welcome aboard the Astral Express. My name is March 7th, I'm one of the passengers. We'll be working together. First, we need to take your induction photo... Did that scare you! Just a joke~

voiceItems.title: Greeting
voiceItems.text: Ah! You're just in time — we haven't taken our selfie today.

voiceItems.title: Parting
voiceItems.text: I'm gonna get some rest after I've sorted these photos. Don't stay up all night playing video games again!

voiceItems.title: About Self: Name
voiceItems.text: I came up with my name myself, but some people just call me March... Which do you prefer?

voiceItems.title: About Self: Past
voiceItems.text: Maybe my past isn't behind me, but in front of me. That's why I'm gonna keep going forward, one stop at a time... train or no train.

voiceItems.title: Chat: Juice
voiceItems.text: Ahh, juice... If I say the word, I get a craving. If I get a craving, I wanna drink some. And if I drink some... Ahh... I can't stop!

voiceItems.title: Chat: Photos
voiceItems.text: Of course photos aren't reality, but if you have enough of them, doesn't reality come a little closer?

voiceItems.title: Hobbies
voiceItems.text: Taking pictures. Writing in my diary. What else is there to say~?

voiceItems.title: Annoyances
voiceItems.text: I get really bored when no one's talking to me. When we're on the Express, Himeko and Mr. Yang are pretty busy, but Dan Heng's usually free. He doesn't like chatting though...

voiceItems.title: Something to Share
voiceItems.text: Every time I'm done sorting my album and look out the window, I always want to take another picture... Even though I've seen the view a thousand times, I still feel happy looking at the stars like this.

voiceItems.title: Knowledge
voiceItems.text: No matter how disgusting the dish, you gotta summon your trailblazing spirit and face it! Not gonna lie though, jellied eels and Himeko's coffee are pretty tough to stomach...

voiceItems.title: About Dan Heng
voiceItems.text: ...Dan Heng got on the train before me. He never mentioned his past... If you get the chance, why don't you ask him about it?

voiceItems.title: About Himeko
voiceItems.text: Ahh, beautiful Himeko. She's sensible, reliable, and elegant. It's great to have her as the navigator... When I'm grown up, I'm gonna be just like her! I like the now me too though~

voiceItems.title: About Welt
voiceItems.text: I heard Mr. Yang was once the leader of a secret organization and saved a whole planet! Not to mention he's been a teacher, and even a storyboard artist! *sigh* He must be an alien or something...

storyItems.title: Character Details
storyItems.text:
A spirited and quirky young girl who is into all the things girls her age are interested in, such as taking photos.
She was awakened from a piece of drifting eternal ice, only to find that she knows nothing about herself or her past. Though initially feeling dejected, she decided to name herself after the date of her rebirth.
And thus, on that day, March 7th was born.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part I
storyItems.text:
Why does March 7th take photos?
"First of all, girls like me should like this kind of pastime."
"Besides, I won't forget anything that I keep a photo of."

What has March 7th come to learn about photography?
"Number one, when taking pictures of terrible cuisines, all the details must be clearly visible on the pictures because 'Taking pictures of food is equal to eating them. Every detail matters.'"
"Number two, as long as you take a picture with your eyes closed, you will be able to capture an expression of your subject with their eyes closed."

Why is March 7th always wearing her camera?
"Because if anyone ever seals me away in ice again, at least I'll have my camera with me!"

So why doesn't March 7th just use the camera on her phone?
"Oh yeah, why not — hang on, it's because of that sense of formality!"

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part II
storyItems.text:
March 7th's ability is "Six-Phased Ice", but she has always insisted that it is not ice but some kind of condensed crystal.
"Come on, ice can't be this beautiful."

The bows and arrows March 7th uses in battle are also made of the Six-Phased Ice, but she is not satisfied with the fact that her weapon is a bow.
"Great warriors never use bows!"
"Besides, if I use my ice arrow to attack my ice shield, nothing will happen at all!"

March 7th has also worked hard to practice a unique skill called "Star Crazing: Glass Greatsword," but she never succeeded.
"March, judging by the name, it should be a greatsword, right?"
"Well, but it doesn't feel as good as an ice sculpture... smash."

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part III
storyItems.text:
Compared to Pom-Pom the conductor, Himeko the pilot, Dan Heng the guard, and Welt the jack-of-all-trades, even March 7th has a hard time explaining her role aboard the Express despite calling herself a "warrior".
But March 7th's every move affects the crew's course of action all the time.

"Passenger March 7th slipped and fell..."
"March, watch out for the galena ball above your head."
"March, have you taken pictures of the sights over there?"
"I believe March. If she said it's not delicious, then it's truly not delectable."

Rather than calling March 7th someone who constantly worries people, it would be better to say that she works her way into people's hearts.
March 7th, of course, is oblivious to this, and is struggling to think up the right role for Trailblazer.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part IV
storyItems.text:
For March 7th, who has been drifting in space, the situation in which she awoke isn't too bad.
She woke up on a passing train, and the people on the train looked friendly.
The only problem is that even though she has a reasonable understanding of what's going on around her, she still doesn't know anything about herself.

"Who am I? Where do I come from..."

March 7th looks at herself in the mirror, imagining dozens of potential past lives for herself as she tries on the various outfits that Himeko had assembled for her.
But she can't be sure what her past was like, and what kind of past a girl like her should have...
The only thing March 7th can choose to be is her current self, and the only thing she can look forward to is the future.
She is both frightened and glad.
